text.content:
#

Biome

Common (5 gp) [DC 9]

Uncommon (20 gp) [DC 12]

Rare (100 gp) [DC 15]

Standard Biomes

1

Coastal

[Action] Potion of Sleep: You feel extremely sleepy and fall unconscious as you drift into sleep.

[Minor Action] Potion of Water Walking: You can choose to walk on water as if it is a solid surface at will. Turbulent water is treated as rough terrain to traverse. While swimming on the surface of water, you can raise to the surface as a minor action. While underwater, you can dash toward the surface of water as a minor action.

[Action] Potion of Poison Resistance: You are resistant to Poison Damage for the duration.

2

Grassland (Plains and Savannas)

[Minor Action] Potion of Sturdiness: Gain (Potency Roll) temporary hit points.

[Minor Action] Potion of Speed: Your movement speed increases by 30ft for the duration.

[Minor Action] Potion of Calm Emotion: You have the effects of the Calm Emotions spell applied to you for the duration.

3

Jungle (Tropical Forest)

[Minor Action] Potion of Frenzy: You are frenzied for the duration.

[Action] Potion of Lightning Resistance: You are resistant to Lightning Damage for the duration.

[Action] Poison: You are Poisoned until cured.

4

Marine

[Minor Action] Potion of Breath: You can hold your breath twice as long for the duration.

[Minor Action] Potion of Swimming: Your swim speed increases by 30ft for the duration.

[Minor Action] Potion of Water Breathing: You are able to breathe water for the duration.

5

Mountain

[Minor Action] Potion of Leaping: Your jump height is doubled for the duration.

[Action] Potion of Physical Resilience: Reduce Bludgeoning, Slashing, and Piercing damage dealt to you by 1 for the duration.

[Minor Action] Potion of Growth: Your size increases by 1 level, and your damage dice for all physical weapons are increased by 1 level. All equipped clothing and weapons change size with you.

6

Shrubland (Dirt Desert)

[Minor Action] Potion of Hot Weather Resilience: You have advantage on checks relating to hot climates.

[Action] Potion of Death: You become sickened for 1 minute, and then fall unconscious and appear dead upon inspection for the duration. The false death can be successfully recognized by a DC 18 Intelligence (Medicine) check, or a DC 18 Intelligence (Arcana) check on the potion itself, at which point it is called a 'Potion of False Death'.

[Minor Action] Potion of Euphoria: You feel a rush of euphoria that lasts for the duration. Each time this potion is had within a week, the less effective the result is. In addition, if you have this more than twice in a week, you start to become Sickened the next day for the 1 level of length longer, unless more is imbibed. This effect increases by 1 level further for each time the potion is imbibed within the duration of being Sickened.

7

Taiga (Snow Forest)

[Minor Action] Potion of Cold Weather Resilience: You have advantage on checks relating to cold climates.

[Minor Action] Potion of Vocal Amplification: Your voice is twice as loud and can be audibly heard up to twice the distance.

[Action] Potion of Force Resistance: You are resistant to Force Damage for the duration.

8

Underground

[Minor Action] Potion of Luminescence: Your body glows brightly, casting bright light up to 30 feet, and dim light an additional 30 feet, for the duration.

[Action] Potion of Fear: You are frightened for the duration.

[Action] Potion of Invisibility: You are invisiblefor the duration.

9

Wetland (Swamps, Bogs, and Marshes)

[Action] Potion of Sickening: You are Sickened for the duration.

[Action] Potion of Traversal: Your balance is extraordinarily sharpened. You are not slowed by difficult terrain for the duration.

[Action] Potion of Acid Resistance: You are resistant to Acid Damage for the duration.

10

Woodland (Forest)

[Minor Action] Potion of Weight Lifting: You can lift and carry double the weight for the duration.

[Minor Action] Potion of Shrinkage: Your size decreases by 1 level, and your damage dice for all physical weapons are decreased by 1 level. All equipped clothing and weapons change size with you.

[Minor Action] Potion of the Druid: Gives you a 1d4 piercing damage natural weapon bite and 1d4 slashing damage natural weapon claws.

If made with three creature parts from one specific type of beast creature, you also gain three of the creature's named passive traits.

Geographical Features

11

Canyon

[Minor Action] Potion of Climbing: Your climbing speed is as fast as your movement speed.

[Action] Potion of Armor: Your Armor Class is increased by 1 for the duration.

[Action] Potion of Petrification: You become Petrified until cured.

12

Inland Water (Ponds, Rivers, Oases, etc.)

[Minor Action] Potion of Flavor: Can make up to 10lbs of food delicious. The specific flavor is determined by the creature part used.

[Action] Potion of Memory Loss: You forget your memories before drinking this potion up to a length equal to the duration.

[Action] Potion of Mana: Restore (Potency Roll) Mana.

Low-Plant Biomes [DC +5]

13

Desert, Sand

[Minor Action] Potion of Hallucination: You see hallucinations for the duration. During this time, when you make a Wisdom (Perception) check, the GM rolls a 1d20. On 10 or below for the GM’s roll, regardless of the result of the check, you see something that isn’t real. The lower the 1d20 result, the harder the falsehood is to distinguish from reality.

[Action] Potion of Exhaustion: You gain 1 level of the Exhaustion condition.

[Minor Action] Potion of Haste: Your speed is doubled, your Armor Class is increased by +2, you have advantage on Dexterity (Save) checks, and you have an additional Action on your turn. This action cannot be used for more than one weapon attack.

14

Glacial

[Minor Action] Potion of Wall Walk: Regardless of gravity, you can stick to, stand, crawl, and overall move on walls and ceilings using your standard movement speed for the duration. If the surface would be considered difficult terrain if it were a floor, then the same rules apply. In addition, you are unaffected by slippery floorings.

[Minor Action] Potion of Dispelling: One magical or potion effect is removed, in order of newest to oldest.

[Action] Potion of Cold Resistance: You are resistant to Cold Damage for the duration.

15

Tundra

[Action] Potion of Blindness: You are Blinded for the duration.

[Action] Potion of Duplicity: A double of yourself conjures next to you, fully controllable by you and sharing all senses with you for the duration, after which it dissipates. This conjuration appears identical to you at the time in which the potion activates, and can be touched and interacted with, but can be recognized as a duplicate by a DC 15 Intelligence (Investigation) or (Perception) check. Upon taking any damage, the duplicate dissipates. It can be re-conjured during the duration as a 1 minute ritual.

[Action] Potion of Paralysis: You are Paralyzed for the duration.

16

Volcanic

[Minor Action] Potion of Stickiness: Pour this potion over 5 sqft of surface to make it sticky. When touching a sticky surface, a creature must succeed a DC 14 Strength (Athletics) check, or else have that part of them stuck to the surface. If stuck to an immovable surface, this causes you to be Grappled and have Disadvantage on Dexterity (Save) checks. This check can be repeated each turn as a Minor Action.

[Action] Potion of Spiciness: For the duration, you gain resilience to hot weather, and can breathe fire as an action. Your fire breath is a 20 ft cone, causing each creature in range to make a Dexterity (Save) check against a DC of 10 + your Constitution Modifier, taking 3d6 fire damage on failure, or half as much on success. Once used, you cannot use your fire breath again for another 1 minute.

If made with three creature parts from one specific type of creature, you can change the breath attack's damage type to one that best matches that creature.

If used in small amounts, it acts as a delicious spice to foods.

[Action] Potion of Fire Resistance: You are resistant to Fire Damage for the duration.

Unrealistic Biomes

17

Deep Sea

[Minor Action] Potion of Aquatic Adaptation: You can breathe underwater and gain a swim speed equal to your move speed for the duration.

[Action] Potion of Pressure Adaption: You are immune to damage caused by high pressure or gravity effects.

[Minor Action] Potion of Blindsight: You gain 30ft of Blindsight for the duration.

18

Deep Underground

[Minor Action] Potion of Clinging Shadows: Shadows appear to cling to your body. For the duration, when you make Dexterity (Stealth) checks, add +10 to the result.

[Minor Action] Potion of Darkvision: You gain 30ft of Darkvision for the duration, allowing you to see up to 30 ft in non-magical darkness, and can see an additional 30 ft in dim light.

[Minor Action] Potion of the Blue: If made with three creature parts from one specific type of creature, you can choose one Action in Combat available to that creature. You gain access to this action for the duration.

19

High Altitude / Skylands

[Minor Action] Potion of Feather Fall: For the duration, you can choose to slow your fall as a Non-Action to prevent fall damage.

[Action] Potion of Sunlight Immunity: Negates Sunlight Weakness, and you cannot be Blinded for the duration.

[Minor Action] Potion of Flight: For the duration, you gain the ability to levitate with a fly speed of 30ft.

Otherworldly Biomes

20

Darkworld

[Minor Action] Potion of Telepathy: You can communicate using telepathy with any creature with an Intelligence of 4 or more, so long as you share at least one language.

[Minor Action] Potion of Shadow Form: You and everything you're wearing and carrying turn into a shadowy, gaseous form for the duration. While in this form, nothing on you can be used, and your AC becomes 15 for the duration, increased to 18 while in shadows. Your movement is a hover speed of 10ft, increased to 30 ft while in shadows, and you are immune to non-magical damage. You can move through and occupy the space of other creatures, as well as squeeze through small cracks and openings as small as a centimeter. You can additionally hide in someone's shadow with a Dexterity (Stealth) check with advantage. Your natural weapons and unarmed attacks are reduced by 1 size, and deal necrotic damage instead. You cannot be knocked prone or otherwise fall, instead becoming a thinner shadow.

[Action] Potion of Necrotic Resistance: You are resistant to Necrotic Damage for the duration.

20

Lightworld

[Action] Potion of Regeneration: You restore 1d4 hit points at the start of your turn for the duration.

[Minor Action] Potion of the Right Shoulder: You gain a very strong conscience and sense of morality for the duration.

[Action] Potion of Radiant Resistance: You are resistant to Radiant Damage for the duration.

20

Outer Space

[Minor Action] Potion of Oxygen: You do not need to breathe for the duration.

[Action] Potion of Rejuvenation: You cure or restore one permanent non-magical negative effect, such as regrowing a missing limb, restoring your mind from permanent madness, and so on.

[Action] Potion of Rebirth: Your race changes as if from the Reincarnate spell.

20

Realm of Fiends

[Minor Action] Potion of New Form: For the duration, you can change your height, weight, sound of your voice, and so on, allowing you to appear as another being for the duration, even one of another race. However, your statistics and size remain the same, you cannot change your height by more than a foot, or your weight by more than 50lbs, and you cannot add or remove limbs or change your body shape during this process. For example, a bipedal creature cannot become quadrupedal or vice versa. So long as this effect is active, you can change your form again as an Action.

[Minor Action] Potion of the Left Shoulder: You lose all conscience and any sense of humanity or morality for the duration.

[Minor Action] Potion of Vigilance: You can use your Reaction as an Action when a target uses a Desperate Action once per potion potency level.

20

Realm of Magic

[Minor Action] Potion of Dreams: The next time you fall asleep during a long rest, you fall into a deep sleep with vivid and pleasant dreams. Once asleep, you cannot be awoken from this state for the duration by traditional means.

[Minor Action] Potion of Love: You are charmed by the first person you see for the duration, and feel a particular affinity and connection with the creature for the duration.

[Action] Potion of Transformation: This potion has no effect without a creature part included, and requires three times the creature parts, and all from the same creature type. When you brew this potion, make note of which creature the creature parts come from. When imbibed, this potion transforms the imbiber into this creature as if the Shapeshift spell was cast on them for the duration.

---

Other Worlds

GM will define the effect of other world herbs

GM will define the effect of other world herbs

GM will define the effect of other world herbs
